name: Bright Bruiser Demo
description:
(IMPORTANT)

Be sure not to play this on Firefox, since the game has memory leak issues that cause lag in that browser. If it seems that the game is taking forever to start up, opening a new tab, then going back/closing the tab should fix that.
  
This demo has 3 levels, with the first 2 unlocked from the start, and 3 difficulty settings.
